I'm guessing Click 1 is really Click 7, and Click 5 is really click 11? So you can risk increasing his damage, up to a flurry/two target/13 attack BCF, but at the cost of his survivability. If he can survive a turn as a pinata, then he can spend his 2-token turn flipping back to click 1/7.
